purpose: The email invites submissions for the International Symposium on Sustainable Systems Technologies and Green Computing (STGC) scheduled for October 15-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia. It encourages original research papers, case studies, and industry insights on topics related to sustainable and energy-efficient software systems. The symposium is co-located with the 3rd International Conference on Federated Learning Technologies and Applications (FLTA 2025). Accepted papers will be published in IEEE Xplore. Key dates include a submission deadline of August 2, 2025, and the symposium date on October 15, 2025.

evidence_sentences: We are pleased to invite you to submit your original research papers, case studies, and industry insights to our upcoming symposium.
STGC is co-located with the 3rd International Conference on Federated Learning Technologies and Applications (FLTA 2025), which will take place on October 14-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia.
STS aims to address the growing demand for sustainable, energy-efficient, and resilient software systems by exploring innovative approaches in technology and system development.
Accepted papers will be published in IEEE Xplore in the proceedings of FLTA 2025.
